replies.author: Salt_lovely
replies.txt_content:
NoCheatPlus::Event: f.n.n.c.b.c.BlockChangeListener (BlockPistonRetractEvent)count(5053488)  total(30.00% 153.543s, 282.25% of tick)
NoCheatPlus::Event: f.n.n.c.b.c.BlockChangeListener (BlockPistonExtendEvent)count(257637)  total(2.41% 12.35s, 22.70% of tick)
NoCheatPlus::Event: f.n.n.c.b.c.BlockChangeListener (BlockPistonRetractEvent)count(330693)  total(2.09% 10.694s, 19.66% of tick)

NCP（nocheatplus）监听方块互动（应该主要是红石系统的方块）占用大量资源，建议删掉NCP插件，换别的反作弊插件
（如果你对自己的能力有自信，可以去找找配置文件里面有没有相关监听，删掉）

https://www.mcbbs.net/forum-servermod-1.html
